Description: Regular employees are entitled to 15 paid leaves per calendar year. Leaves can be carried forward up to 5 days to next year.
Key_Points:
- 15 leaves per year
- 5 days max carry forward
- Requires 2 days advance notice
- Cannot accumulate beyond 20 days

Description: Employees get 12 paid sick leaves annually. Medical certificate required for leaves exceeding 2 consecutive days.
Key_Points:
- 12 sick leaves per year
- Doctor's note for >2 days
- Unused sick leaves lapse yearly
- COVID-19 leaves separate

Description: Core working hours are 10:00 AM to 4:00 PM. Flexible timing allowed outside these hours with manager approval.
Key_Points:
- Core hours: 10 AM - 4 PM
- 9-hour day including 1-hour break
- Minimum 40 hours per week
- Flexi-timing available

Description: Employees can work from home up to 2 days per week. Requires manager approval and must maintain productivity.
Key_Points:
- 2 WFH days per week maximum
- Must be available during core hours
- Internet speed >50 Mbps required
- Monthly WFH report required

Description: Business casual attire required. Formal wear on client meetings and Fridays are casual days.
Key_Points:
- Business casual: Mon-Thu
- Casual Fridays allowed
- Client meetings: Formal wear
- No flip-flops or shorts

Description: Business travel expenses reimbursed within 15 days. Economy class for flights <5 hours, business class for longer.
Key_Points:
- Economy for <5 hour flights
- Business class for long haul
- Daily allowance: $50
- Receipts mandatory for >$25

Description: Annual training budget of $1000 per employee. Must be job-related and approved by manager.
Key_Points:
- $1000 annual budget
- Must complete 40 hours training/year
- Certification reimbursement available
- LinkedIn Learning access provided

Description: All employees must adhere to ethical business practices. No gifts >$50 from vendors. Annual ethics training mandatory.
Key_Points:
- No gifts >$50 value
- Annual ethics certification
- Conflict of interest disclosure
- Confidentiality agreement binding

Description: Company internet for business use primarily. Limited personal use allowed. No streaming or downloading unauthorized content.
Key_Points:
- Personal use <2 hours/week
- No streaming or gaming
- Software installation requires IT approval
- VPN mandatory for remote work

Description: Annual performance bonus up to 20% of CTC. Based on individual and company performance metrics.
Key_Points:
- Up to 20% of annual salary
- Paid in March every year
- 50% individual + 50% company perf
- Minimum 6 months service required

Description: 26 weeks paid maternity leave. Additional 4 weeks unpaid leave available if needed.
Key_Points:
- 26 weeks paid leave
- Can start 4 weeks before due date
- Flexible return options available
- Lactation breaks post-return

Description: 2 weeks paid paternity leave. Must be taken within 6 months of child birth.
Key_Points:
- 2 weeks (10 working days)
- Take within 6 months of birth
- Flexible scheduling allowed
- Adoption covered same policy

Description: Comprehensive health insurance coverage of $100,000 per year. Covers employee and immediate family.
Key_Points:
- $100k annual coverage
- Pre-existing conditions covered
- Dental & vision included
- Cashless hospitalization available

Description: 12% basic salary contributed to PF. Voluntary contributions up to additional 10% allowed.
Key_Points:
- Mandatory 12% PF contribution
- Option for higher contribution
- Withdrawal allowed after 2 years
- Interest rate ~8.5% annually

Description: Formal process for workplace concerns. Anonymous reporting option available. Resolution within 21 days.
Key_Points:
- Anonymous reporting allowed
- Resolution within 21 days
- No retaliation policy
- Escalation to HR committee

Description: 5 days paid leave in case of immediate family demise. Additional 2 days for travel if required.
Key_Points:
- 5 days for immediate family
- 2 extra days for outstation travel
- Immediate family: spouse, parents, children, siblings
- Document required

Description: Monthly allowances include: $150 communication, $100 internet, $200 transport for eligible roles.
Key_Points:
- $150 phone/internet reimbursement
- $200 transport allowance
- $100 meal card
- Applicable for specific roles

Description: 6 months probation period for new hires. Performance review at 3 and 6 months. Extension possible up to 3 months.
Key_Points:
- 6 months standard probation
- Reviews at month 3 and 6
- Maximum 3 months extension
- Confirmation requires manager approval

Description: 90 days notice period for all permanent employees. Buyout option available with management approval.
Key_Points:
- 90 days notice period
- Buyout: 3 months salary
- Garden leave possible
- Non-compete clause applies

Description: 2 floating holidays per year. Can be used for any personal observance. Must be planned 2 weeks in advance.
Key_Points:
- 2 floating days annually
- Book 2 weeks in advance
- Cannot carry forward
- Available after probation
